description:
Play as a dodo bird to find and rescue your lost babies from a series of dangerous peaks. Maneuver them home while avoiding obstacles and enemies! Dodo Peak is a throwback to the classic arcade platformers of the past with a modern twist.

Collect coins, dodge sneaky snakes, avoid malevolent monkeys, grab power-ups for extra speed or super strength, and strive for the best time across a stunning variety of handcrafted islands. As your pack grows, so does the challenge in bringing them home!

Features:
-Beautiful handcrafted levels with unique layouts, goals, and enemies.
-Simple controls anyone can learn, with plenty of challenging levels as you grow your skills.
-Play across tropical islands, dangerous volcanoes, and other wondrous environments.
-Unlock funny and unique new dodos by beating levels and collecting coins.
-Perfect for short play sessions on the bus or longer play times on your couch.
-Compete to finish levels the fastest on in-game leaderboards or try your hand at Weekly Challenges for extra-hard versions of levels each week.
name: Dodo Peak
